caption.title: Municipal headquarters located within 100 km of the microcephaly care units in the states of Rio Grande do Norte, Paraiba and Bahia.
caption.p: The names of the respective health units are shown in Table 3. Source: maps generated by LDP/IOC/FIOCRUZ based on data provided by State Health Department of Rio Grande do Norte; Paraiba State Department of Health; State Secretariat of Health of Bahia.
